website_summaries.verdict: A fun play castle that's easy to set up quickly and store when not being used.
pros: Lightweight princess castle tent that can be set up in only a couple minutes
Easy to pack away in the included carrying bag
Measures 51 inches tall and 40 inches in diameter
cons: The supports are a little flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome
customer_reviews.text: It’s big. It’s colorful. It’s light weight. It’s nice. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect
customer_reviews.text: My twin 3 year olds absolutely love this. Easy to assemble and disassemble. Very cute and affordable. They get so excited to go play in their very own castle. If you’re even debating if you should get this, STOP. Just get it. I looked at so many of these before picking this one and I’m glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Marry A.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: There is always that thought “is this going to be what I expect?” Well it was! Great purchase at a great price. My 4yr old loved it! She’s tall for her age and she had more than enough room even I was able to get in in the fun.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality children's tent!
customer_reviews.text: This tent was a gift to my 3 year old niece for Christmas. She absolutely loved it! After the tent was set up she dragged all of her presents into the tent to play with them. The tent itself was easy to get set up and the fabric exterior seems to be of a good, sturdy quality. The color is true to the picture and the size of the tent is true to the description. This tent is a great gift for any child who enjoys having their own personal space. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Bentsen

customer_reviews.title: An absolute beautiful tent
customer_reviews.text: This is an adorable play tent. It's well made and I love the design and colors . It's unique and different from all the other princess play tents on Amazon. Happy to be the first to review it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anderson

customer_reviews.title: My girls' dream tent
customer_reviews.text: My daughters 3 and 6 really enjoy the tent. They both fit in it with their toys. It's is fine on a carpet, but I put a throw under it when they are using it on the floor. It can be moved easily from one room to another.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Newcomb

customer_reviews.title: How badly do you want to throw money away?
customer_reviews.text: If you want low cost and low quality thisbis perfect for you. If you want something that even vaguely resembles professional manufacturing then do not but this. Quick list of a few of the many issues include. A crooked door that barely covers the opening. Cut and hung crooked. Velcro door retainers are in the wrong spots for the door. Poles and house so not aling as they should so the stability is questionable. I fully expect this to be broke with in the first week. So much so that the play tent my daughter is outgrowing is being saved and stored.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Play tent is much smaller than expected, fabric is very thin, flimsy. Definitely NOT for two kids to PLAY , may be just for sit together
customer_reviews.author: No bull

customer_reviews.title: poles are not very durable for loppp
customer_reviews.text: This tent was a gift for my daughter and she absolutely loved it, n but after just 3 days one of the poles holding it up snapped in half! We tried fixing it and now the tent lays sideways and she has no interest n a broken castle. i feel for the money i spent on this castle the durability should b a lot better than it was. As for the rest of the castle it was great!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rotkiske

customer_reviews.title: Winner!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this!!! We set it up in her bedroom and she loves to cozy up in there with blankets and her pillows and tablet
customer_reviews.author: Ophemria

customer_reviews.title: Big hit!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble/disassemble and true to description. VERY large so be conscious of the diameter in the listing. Can fit an adult inside it! (Or 2 children easily). Great price too! It did have a manufacturing odor upon opening so we let it air out for a day or so and then it was fine. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ali Mac

customer_reviews.title: Don't order!!! Refund please!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My order came ripped. I am not able to return it or use it. So I pretty much wasted money. Save your time and money. You can contact me at desirayehunt@gmail.com because I want my money back. I didn't even get to use it or set it up. I literally threw 30 dollars away. Smh the box was ripped too!!
customer_reviews.author: desiray4

customer_reviews.title: Great design but requires a little set up
customer_reviews.text: This is super cute. Set up with my girls little people inside and they played all night! Inside has a palace and roads with shops like a play rug! The only con is that it does not just pop up and go. You have to install the arms inside and tie them in place. Otherwise, this is super cute forn1-5 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: MrsM

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the price
customer_reviews.text: Its mostly a great play tent except one of the ties on the inside were missing... So it sags a little, and the post thingy swings loose in there. Also I can't get the turrets unfolded so they look kind of weird from being folded. Daughter thinks its great though
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Princess Play Tent Playhouse
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for almost three weeks already. Pros: beautiful and vibrant colors, good size, compact and convenient to transport. Cons: seams get quickly torn apart, fragile and unreliable inserts. Summary: quality does reflect the price
customer_reviews.author: Boris Mouromski

customer_reviews.title: Girls will love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought one as a gift and when I received it I didn't like the box it came it, looked really cheap but it was too late to get something else. My niece who really likes princesses loves it and uses it to go in and read. Quality is okay and setup was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 3

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it, but a different one. With all the options to buy I should have bought a different one. The playful design of this one got my attention but it’s very poorly made. I doubt it will last the week. There are already seams pulling apart after putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: VanessannW

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a Little Princess
customer_reviews.text: My three year old granddaughter loves this little play house castle. I am not mechanically inclined but able to put this together without any trouble at all. We both can fit in it at the same time. Roomy enough for both of us and her dolls. I would buy this again. Her brother has been a little rough with it, but we put it right back together without any trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: So cute! My baby girl loves being a princess in her nice tent. She plays for hours, cuddling up with whatever blankie a she can find. It’s not super sturdy, but for the price it’s a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Darlinn

customer_reviews.title: Cute but a bit flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and it’s a good size! I went with 4 instead of 5 stars because although the material is good quality, it’s a bit flimsy with the supports.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Cute but slightly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute, and easy to put together. However, we have had it for less than three months and already has a hole in it. It is only used by 3 girls under 5. I would think it should have held up longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed! It’s flimsy and small! I was embarrassed to put it together because it was nothing like the product described! And it was a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Great play tent!
customer_reviews.text: Works great, looks great, holds up to toddler abuse, have had for months now. Longest lasting one we've tried. I think it's due to the flexibility of the rods that hold it up
customer_reviews.author: mefirst21

customer_reviews.title: ITEM NOT SAME AS PICTURE
customer_reviews.text: Product didn't match what I actually received. :( didn't have time to return or place another order. Was a Christmas gift for our granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Princess
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 stars because I did have to have it exchanged. The first one was defective. The poles didn’t match the slots. The second one was perfect. My 3 yr old loves it and I love that I can shove all the toys in it! 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Samar

customer_reviews.title: Material was ripped
customer_reviews.text: There was about a 12 inch rip around the top. This was for my 6 year old granddaughters birthday. I had to use safety pins to fix it until I could get to the store for sturdy thread.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this. Won’t stay out of it. Nice quality
customer_reviews.author: Angie Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: Cute and perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old daughter LOVES this! Can comfortably fit 2 toddlers in there and fit 4 in there if they're okay with being squishy.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Bolton

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute and fun little play tent. My 4-year old daughter enjoys it, and apparently, so do my cats. I find them sleeping in it once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer in Shrewsbury

customer_reviews.title: Play time essential
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old adores this castle. She drags me into and makes me play doctor. And I love every moment.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Just got done putting it together for my daughters birthday tomorrow. It was super easy!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Y.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and good quality tent
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice tent for my two daughters, they love it soooo much! They can build their own castle and waiting their princess..lol
customer_reviews.author: Man Wang

customer_reviews.title: Won’t last
customer_reviews.text: It broke right away. The sticks that hold up the tent are exposed. Won’t last long
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Princess Tent
customer_reviews.text: It is adorable, easy to put up, very colorfull, and it even has a floor and windows! My Grand Daughters love it!
customer_reviews.author: ksimmonds

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for both indoor & outdoor playtime. Perfect size, too!
customer_reviews.text: Made a little 3 year old the ideal Pandemic birthday gift! Fits in her bedroom and ideal for outdoor play time, too!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Marie

customer_reviews.title: Cute, daughter loves it, but cheeply made.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 16 month old daughter for Christmas, it is cute and she loves it. But it did have a hole in it upon arrival, and they should have made slots for the sticks to go through all the way up the side so that they dont get pulled on or pushed on as easily, for $45 it should be a lot sturdier and of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: SGT Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Fun tent!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 2 year old daughter. She loves it as well as keeping my 1 year old son entertained
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Moreau

customer_reviews.title: Turned out great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a 4 year old,she absolutely loved it and colors are vibrant and nice,go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Shivithakur

customer_reviews.title: My grand daughter LOVED it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grand daughter, and I am SO pleased with how big it is! It was the perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Sonja Myers

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: She saw, she wanted, she ordered it, it came fast with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Not so sturdy
customer_reviews.text: First I got a damage one so I had to make a return and order again . Just a nice alternative for your child but not really sturdy . It’s not cheap too for the quality
customer_reviews.author: catherine

customer_reviews.title: Why not?
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! And for a Princess that likes to play rough, its held up nice to some abuse. For the price and joy you'll say why not. Small enough to fit it a bedroom but big enough to play in.
customer_reviews.author: Calvary McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My almost 3 year old loves this castle. She plays, sleeps, and "reads" in there every chance she gets. I can fit in there as well but it gets warm in there!
customer_reviews.author: bernut86

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old nieces birthday and my 7 year old niece loved it just as much if not more! Great buy! Perfect size not too big or small
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Castle
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her castle. She put fluffy pillows and a blanket inside and plays in there for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Rikki

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pink castle
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Perfect for reading and playtime. fits 1 adult and a baby comfortably. Great, for indoor play.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Little girls love it
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter loves it. It's a little flimsy but easy to assemble and dissemble once you do it a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: Javier J

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Gave it for a gift in September and it is still up!
customer_reviews.author: Angels

customer_reviews.title: Perfect play castle!
customer_reviews.text: My girls have had a blast in their new princess castle. It’s a good size that two toddlers can play with room to spare and it’s easy enough to collapse if you need the space like us since we have a very small home.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Great Size for 2 kids
customer_reviews.text: Gave this for Christmas to a 5 year old and 2 1/2 year old they were thrilled. Great Graphics. You have to get inside it to set up so a little tricky. Everyone was very pleased with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn H.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and just the right size.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters 5, 3, and 2 years old love this princess tent. It’s a great buy but it’s not as sturdy as I’d hoped it would be. The poles move around when they get rowdy inside but I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room
customer_reviews.text: I love that it easily fits my 3 girls in there comfortably and set up was simple.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Dukes

customer_reviews.title: Homerun with this buy!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loves this and so does my 3 year granddaughter for whom it was purchased. The two of us have spent hours playing in it. It was a homerun purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Berner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful  " castle"
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, great colors. Got it for my granddaughter 3rd birthday and she loves it, she spends hours playing in there. Great size also for a toddler girl.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalba Qumsieh

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My little one love this. Plays with it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Santa clause

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: The best gift for a little girl. She will love it. It's very roomie. My daughter is vet happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: stormie fox

customer_reviews.title: Missing Velcro
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters room. It looks cute, and she loves it! The con is that there was a Velcro piece missing on both sides. I had to jimmy rig the castle top. Otherwise likeable
customer_reviews.author: Koren Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy to put away and assemble
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my niece for her 3rd birthday and it was a hit! We have little tea parties inside all the time! Not super strong material so will tear if you get to rough or fit too many people inside at once but great little tent!
customer_reviews.author: Christin Melton

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent for my five-year-old and she absolutely love it! She always play with it inside and outside. When her cousins come over all 5 of them fit inside.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Woods

customer_reviews.title: My niece loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my niece. She loves it! Fits perfectly in the corner of the playroom. She spends all her time in it.
customer_reviews.author: C. E. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up and take down, my daughter absolutely loves this and now keeps all her toys inside. This was the perfect gift for my 5 year old! And super roomy too
customer_reviews.author: Baldemar Ortegon

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun, good quality!
customer_reviews.text: My 1 1/2 yr old granddaughter loves playing in her tent with her baby dolls. Actually big enough for me to go in and sit with her. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Beutiful gift for my 3 years old daughter. She love it. Nice quality. Beutiful colors and pictures. Super recommeded.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Windows for air and checking on the princess.
customer_reviews.text: The best tent, good size, not to big and not to small. It is a perfect for one or two toddlers. I like the windows and the roll up door for air and the windows are great to look in on the princess.
customer_reviews.author: KAREN

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Was present for 1 st bday and she loved it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old granddaughter loves her princess tent playhouse!! It’s big enough for an adult and child or 2-3 small children to enjoy reading books, have a tea party or play with dolls. A cute getaway space!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Newman

customer_reviews.title: My granddaugters like it
customer_reviews.text: nicely made good looking and not taking to much space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So great
customer_reviews.text: I got it as a gift for the kid I take care and she simply loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!!
customer_reviews.text: 6 year old loves it!! It is her own space. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Saad

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great with the exception of tear down and storage. The bending and storing method is simply not intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: Cory McAnelly

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC BUY!
customer_reviews.text: MY 2 1/2 YEAR OLD GRANDDAUGHTER LOVES HER PRINCESS CASTLE. ITS EASY TO PUT TOGETHER AND IT KEEPS HER BUSY. SHE HAS STUFFED ANIMALS INSIDE ALONG WITH HER TABLET. NOW SHE DOESN'T WANT TO COME OUT. IT WAS A GREAT BUY. WELL WORTH THE MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn jewels

customer_reviews.title: Great tent for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My two girls (2 and 4) got this tent for Christmas and they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: best tent i have ever seen, a bit small BUT THE BEST
customer_reviews.author: Uzma

customer_reviews.title: Pretty! Big enough for one adult and child
customer_reviews.text: Taller than my 5 year old and she’s 4 foot 2!
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Robust and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: It took less than 5 minutes to assemble it, and it is resisting an 8 months old frenzy pretty remarkably so far
customer_reviews.author: Remy Glaisner

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves to hide in her princess tent, super easy to assemble and easy to take down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little tent for my daughters! They love it too! So much space as well.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter birthday and she loves it. Easy assembly and good quality.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money we paid
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our one year old baby and this thing did not last 3weeks, either want a replacement or my refund .

customer_reviews.title: The stability of the product
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for our granddaughter's birthday. Would recommend to othera

customer_reviews.title: Cute but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute, but it’s very flimsy, one of the poles has already broken.

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES hers. Great material, easy to take down and go!

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift for little girl
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my granddaughter.Shes loves it.Its perfect for little princess.

customer_reviews.title: Good starter tent
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves it, plays in it all the time with her sister ! Recommend

customer_reviews.title: It is really fun for kids
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3 year old daughter and she loves it.

customer_reviews.text: Grand dgtr LOVES her Princess tent!! Quick delivery, easy instructions, well built!!!💖

product_meta.title: Princess Play Tent Playhouse | Unique Castle Design for Indoor and Outdoor Fun, Imaginative Games & Gift | Foldable Playhouse Toy + Carry Bag for Girls & Boys | by Imagenius Toys
feature_bullets: ULTIMATE PRINCESS CASTLE TENT: Vibrant detailed illustrations on the outside and inside of the tent will let your child's imagination soar.

EASY SETUP AND CLEANUP: The lightweight tent can be opened and set up in just a few minutes. It can also be compactly packed away in the included carry bag for storage or travel. Cleanup us easy with a damp cloth and mild soap.

HIGH QUALITY: The polyester fabric and printing are non-toxic and water resistant. The fabric and fiberglass rods are strong and durable. Two mesh windows for air ventilation help keep kids cool and allow parents to monitor their children.

VERSATILE: Standing 51" tall and 40" in diameter, the play tent will fit in any indoor space or outside. Makes a great birthday or Christmas gift for boys, girls, and children of all ages. Perfect addition to play dates, birthday parties, themed events, carnivals.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - Providing quality products and customer satisfaction is our priority. Love the Princess Tent or return it for a refund.
